thread.title: Police release CCTV after elderly man with dementia tricked in burglary
thread.title_full: Police release CCTV after elderly man with dementia tricked in burglary | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Police release CCTV after elderly man with dementia tricked in burglary
text:
Do you recognise the man in the bobble hat? Credit: West Yorkshire Police Police have released CCTV images of a man they want to identify in connection with a burglary at a vulnerable elderly man's home in Leeds.
The incident happened at an address in Westfield Lane, Kippax, on Tuesday, November 8 last year.
The incident happened in Kippax Credit: West Yorkshire Police A man called at the home of the victim, who has dementia, and convinced him he owed him money before being given an amount of cash.
We have been carrying out enquiries into this offence since it was reported and are now keen to identify the man shown in the images.
â€“ PC Kirsty Senior, of Leeds District Safeguarding Unit Last updated Fri 3 Feb 2017 Leeds West Yorkshire
